channel.title: Help with a command?

item.title: Help with a command?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I have downloaded the staffcapes in the models section, and added them into my client.

	if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffcapes")) {
	if (playerRights = 0) {
	sendMessage("You don't need any staff capes!");
	} else if (playerRights = 1) {
	addItem(13966, 1);
	sendMessage("There you go!");
	} else if (playerRights = 2) {
	addItem(13965, 1);
	sendMessage("There you go!");
	} else if (playerRights = 3) {
	addItem(13964, 1);
	sendMessage("There you go!");
	}

That is my code, but it always gives me errors!
Why?

Read full topic
